typedef struct _{name} {{

  char uuid[36+1];   /*!< UUID for this data instance. */

{list_dimensions:  size_t {dim_name};  /*!< {dim_descr} */\n}

{list_properties:  {prop_cdecl};  /*!< {prop_descr} */\n}
